<Extension()> Public Function CheckNameAvailability (operations As IRecoveryServicesOperations, resourceGroupName As String, location As String, input As CheckNameAvailabilityParameters) As CheckNameAvailabilityResult

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.
Contains information about Resource type and Resource name
Docs.summary: API to check for resource name availability. A name is available if no other resource exists that has the same SubscriptionId, Resource Name and Type or if one or more such resources exist, each of these must be GC'd and their time of deletion be more than 24 Hours Ago
